stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains Rousseauâ€™s importance to the development of Romanticism?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of Romanticism.

choicesHtml: He questioned the assertion of the equal rights of women.
He believed that society was based on a social contract.
He emphasized the role of emotions in moral improvement.
He published one of the first confessional autobiographies.
